definition: exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: This thing is supposed to be a whole number here.
Return the integer portion of a number.
It is the nearest whole number to an atom's ATOMIC WEIGHT.
sentences.chinese: 它是最接近原子的原子量的整数。

sentences.english: A score of 100 points integer times, eliminate a bright Red Cross.
sentences.chinese: 分数达到100分的整数倍，消除一个亮红的交叉。

sentences.english: a to the b where b is an integer.
sentences.chinese: 也就是a的b次方，而b是个正整数。

sentences.english: These are the basic blocks so, therefore, whole number ratios is a consequence of that.
sentences.chinese: 这些是基本区块，所以，整数比是那的结果。

sentences.english: Decimal value to a specified number of decimal places.
sentences.chinese: 将小数值舍入到最接近的整数。

sentences.english: Those values are integers that minimize the problem's objective function.
sentences.chinese: 这些值都是能使整个问题的目标函数最小化的整数值。

sentences.english: That integer is both dividable by two and three, thus, dividable by six.
sentences.chinese: 该整数既是可分两和三，因此，可分六。

sentences.english: For all integers , is a perfect square.
sentences.chinese: 对于每个整数，都是完全平方数。

sentences.english: Returns the largest integer less than or equal to the specified decimal number.
sentences.chinese: 传回小于或等于指定的十进位数字的最大整数。

sentences.english: The length of the device token as a two-byte integer value in network order.
sentences.chinese: 设备令牌的长度为两个字节的整数值的网络字节序。

sentences.english: By default, assign a much smaller integer to all the synonyms.
sentences.chinese: 默认情况下，为所有同义词指定一个较小的整数。

sentences.english: IWT is an image coding algorithm based on the integer wavelet transform by the lifting scheme.
sentences.chinese: 是一种基于提升格式整数小波变换的图像压缩算法。

sentences.english: Turns overflow-error checking for integer operations on or off.
sentences.chinese: 打开或关闭整数操作的溢出错误检查。

sentences.english: They don't distinguish between integer and floating point numbers. Variables are typeless.
sentences.chinese: 脚本不区分整数和浮点数，变量是没有类型的。

definition: small figure/small amount/the part of a number to the right of the decimal point (or radix point)/fractional part of a number/number between 0 and 1/decimal fraction
to round up to the nearest integer/to discard four, but treat five as whole (of decimal points)
rational number (i.e. fraction of two integers, math.)
the factorial of a number, e.g. 5! = 5.4.3.2.1 = 120
